title: Maxhoffman
author: Maxhoffman
content: Greetings! My name is Max HoffmanI am interested in the https://bithound.io/de/casino/national-casino/ and would like more information about it. I wonder how reliable and safe this online casino site is. Are there any independent reviews or verifications that confirm its legitimacy? I would also like to know what types of cryptocurrencies are accepted and what fees or commissions are charged for deposits and withdrawals.In addition, I would like to know if there are any specific restrictions or limitations for players from certain countries and what types of games are available on the platform. Are the games fair and transparent? Is there an RNG test that guarantees the randomness of the game results?And finally, is it safe to play at this online casino site? Is my personal information and cryptocurrencies safe and secure? Would you recommend playing on this platform or are there other crypto casino websites that are safer or more reliable?Thank you in advance for your help and information.Kind regards.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Maxhoffman on April 13, 2023, 11:03:51 PMGreetings! My name is Max HoffmanI am interested in the https://bithound.io/de/casino/national-casino/ and would like more information about it. I wonder how reliable and safe this online casino site is. Are there any independent reviews or verifications that confirm its legitimacy? I would also like to know what types of cryptocurrencies are accepted and what fees or commissions are charged for deposits and withdrawals.In addition, I would like to know if there are any specific restrictions or limitations for players from certain countries and what types of games are available on the platform. Are the games fair and transparent? Is there an RNG test that guarantees the randomness of the game results?And finally, is it safe to play at this online casino site? Is my personal information and cryptocurrencies safe and secure? Would you recommend playing on this platform or are there other crypto casino websites that are safer or more reliable?Thank you in advance for your help and information.Kind regards.Never heard of this gambling site but to answer some of your questions; Restrictions exist in some countries with gambling itself based on the countries' regulation and prohibition rules. With regards to the games being offered, most are traditional games such as card games, dice, slots, and the likes other variation are sportsbetting. With regards to fairness and transparancy it solely depend on the platform whether they would be or not but mostly are not and those who does so are ones which are registered or licensed. There are many gambling sites which you can engage yourself with. A tip of advice are those which has a good reputation in this industry or those whoch are popular. To check legitimacy of a playform, try checking if they are licensed or not. Survey such as this topic qould also help but will only limited to those who are familiar with the gambling site you are checking with.

Here your casino website link: https://bithound.io/de/casino/national-casino/ Is your casino site officially approved?To run a casino site autonomously there are several rules and regulations to follow. The most important thing is the currency system. If your casino site is officially approved then your country must operate as a government approved currency payment system. Along with your native local currency, digital currencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, Litecoin, Solana, Matic, TRX, Dogecoin and as many as possible currencies should be kept active.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: This is the first time I ever saw the name of this casino project called National Casino. The design is very sleek and beautiful to be very honest with you. I see they have already implemented payment from Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies like Ethereum etc. Like other casinos, it also has restrictions, players from certain countries, such as the United States, Spain, France, and the United Kingdom, are not allowed to play on National Casino.If you go through their official URL, in the footer you will see this information:- This website is managed and operated by TechSolutions (CY) Group Limited- registered office located at Parthenonos 5, Flat 103, 2020, Nicosia, Cyprus- Operated by TechSolutions Group N.V. with address at Abraham Mendez Chumaceiro Boulevard 03, Curaçao. Maybe this information will be enough for you to contact them or meet them personally as what I understood is that you are willing to purchase this project.About fees, I think National Casino does not charge any commission for deposits or withdrawals. Hope you get it worked out. Good Luck!

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: As the site stated it clearly that "it is a National Casino" and not Global Casino. When I enter the site the language used in it is not Global Language as well but National Language which can only be used by a Nation and not everyone in the world. And since the site is meant for a special group of people then the help you need from the general public is not possible as well because not everyone understands that you write up. The graphics in the site is also scanty. I don't know if it is from my end of the browser or the device.
